```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
	echo = FALSE,
	message = FALSE,
	warning = FALSE
)
```

```{r load_packages, include=FALSE}
if(!require(pacman)) install.packages("pacman")
pacman::p_load(
  pacman,
  tidyverse,
  flextable,
  knitr,
  mlogit,
  broom
  )
```

```{r functions, include=FALSE}
my_flextable <- function(tibble){
  flextable(tibble) %>%
  autofit() %>%
  align(align = "center", part = "all")
}
```
